channel.title: Donator items and models in blurrs client and dClaws problems
channel.description: i cant find the model folder in my blurrs client and i'd like to make an item a donator but how?? And how do i make my dclaws 1def and 60att without making dragon items 1def... Some pls show me a very explained and detailed TUT on it or some help will be nice

item.title: Donator items and models in blurrs client and dClaws problems
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Listen donator items there is a tut on forums just Search first step is fixed
2. Models create a map called “models” , and Ur finnished add ur models in there and INTS in “class8.java”
finnished tht step to

Now for D claws easyy as hell

Go to config u wil see item.cfg , click on tht u need to do CTRL+F , and Type in Dragon_claw

Rename Dragon Claw to “dragon_claw”

K u did tht , go to wearing.java search attack , under tht u wil see some wepons , example: u wil see public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { and u wil see iron steel etc

Put in under claws : || ItemName2.startsWith("dragon_claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("Dragon_claws")
k we finnished to put it in attack now under tht u see if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) {
Under dragon u need to put } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon_claws")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon_claws")) { return 60;
now Search “defence” public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) { thts what ur going to see
Under Claws add || ItemName2.startsWith("dragon claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("Dragon claws")
then search “dragon” , and under dragon put ; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon_claws")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon_claws")) { return 1;
Save n compile n ur done ;;p

Xd!!

Georgio A little crappy or a little to much
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2009, 07:53:26 am[/size][hr]lol thx Fight for helping him

Now hes done with his source

Georgio , Goodluck Cowbell

Read full topic
item.source: Donator items and models in blurrs client and dClaws problems

item.title: Donator items and models in blurrs client and dClaws problems
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

Okay.

  1. The model folder, is just in all your files? (Mine is atleast.) If not just look in some maps.

  2. You can make a item for an donator, to go to your SERVER client.java
    Search this: if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){ sM("You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape."); return false; } Or something that looks like it

And pes Enter and add this: if(wearID == #### && donator == 1){ sM("You need to be a donator to wield this!"); return false; }

The #### change it to your dclaws id.

  1. How to make dclaws 1 def and 60 attack?
    Easy, go to wearing.java and search for this
	public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

This shoould be near the top.

Now you see alot of things like this: } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon axe")) { return 60;

Under return 60; press enter
and add this: } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon Claws")) { return 60;

search now for public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

u shud see like this: } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Barrow Gloves")) { return 45;

under return 45; press enter and add this: } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon Claws")) { return 1;[/

Read full topic
